vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for water and wastewater main installations at 13 locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Douglas Dailey Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of five - Not to exceed $21,995,793.00 - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($7,808,521.82), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($6,957,281.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($6,589,810.91) and Wastewater Construction Fund ($640,179.27)
